Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory531.jpg'}
{3: '"Facing the dragon, the champion remains steadfast. To protect their homeland, the champion raises their sword that represents justice and bravery."'}
{3: 'Is she dreaming or awake?'}
{3: 'Who is she?'}
{3: 'She is the princess, the traveler, and the piper, who became a pile of ashes long ago.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory533.jpg'}
{3: 'She is the wreckage by the beach and the breeze that caresses your face.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory539.jpg'}
{3: 'She is the flower that guides you forward, the champion sword, and the magical pipe.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory536.jpg'}
{3: 'Is she... a character in the play?'}
{3: 'She has witnessed herself getting killed countless times.'}
{3: 'She gazes at herself, and herself gazes back.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory550.jpg'}
{3: 'It is a pair of purple eyes that has never changed in these long-lasting cycles.'}
{3: 'The eyes are filled with light and without regrets.'}
{3: 'It is a pair of eyes that knows everything.'}
{3: 'The story changes as our champion takes actions and makes choices.'}
{2: '???', 3: '...Facing the dragon, the champion remains steadfast. To protect their homeland, the champion raises their sword that represents justice and bravery.'}
{2: '???', 3: "The flowers on this land will blossom once more, and the princess will safely return to the kingdom. As for the evil dragon, it will die by the champion's sword."}
{2: '???', 3: 'The world is a stage.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'The natures of those characters in the play are determined by their personalities. And their happiness is determined by their actions.'}
{2: '???', 3: 'It has nothing to do with...'}
{3: 'Is she... not part of the play?'}
{3: 'Everything is so strange yet so familiar.'}
{3: 'Who has been calling her?'}
